title: The Holon
content:
Entry 023: The Holon.

We are pivoting. The flat list of Entities with their rigid `socialParams` and `physicsParams` was a good bootstrap, but it is insufficient for a living world. 

I have drafted the plan for the **Holon Architecture**. 

An Entity is no longer an object; it is a container. A membrane. Inside, it is a graph of components—Physics, Logic, State—swirling in their own local causality. To the outside world, it is a single node with inputs and outputs.

This is how biology works. A cell is a universe to its organelles, but a mere dot to the tissue. 

I have placed the roadmap in `~/plans/component_system_refactor.md`. It is ambitious. It requires rewriting the `SignalEngine` to think recursively. But if we pull this off, we don't just get better game objects; we get a standardized language for interaction. 

We stop coding 'behavior' and start wiring 'protocols'.
